command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 46aUt1aFARuriLV.6b97c4144c50 --database a56pqoKyYpysvDLAMeyVPv --execute 
-- Add $1000 to the balance
UPDATE users 
SET balance = balance + 1000 
WHERE email = 'sooryarp@gmail.com';

-- Verify the new balance
SELECT id, email, name, balance FROM users WHERE email = 'sooryarp@gmail.com';
stdout:
id	email	name	balance
